text: Baldingen was a municipality of the district Zurzach in canton of Aargau in Switzerland. On 1 January 2022, the former municipalities of Bad Zurzach, Baldingen, Böbikon, Kaiserstuhl, Rekingen, Rietheim, Rümikon and Wislikofen merged to form the new municipality of Zurzach. ==References== == Other websites == * Official Website of Baldingen Category:Former municipalities of Aargau
title: Baldingen, Aargau
